title.label: Refund me if you won’t update your app

content.label: This was the best mobile RTS game that I’ve played and a great sequel to the original Autumn dynasty. Why can’t the devs keep it updated?
I love the game but can’t play because it’s out of date it needs an update please

title.label: Best Grand Strategy On The App Store, Will Be Missed

content.label:
While there is a certain playstyle the game loves, it still gives you an huge array of ways to play your way. There are different ways to interact with most everything, and you can't become dependent on one factor alone to win, unless you're willing to accept a near endless chaotic campaign. Deep, fun, kind feeling as you interact with various organizations, endless character and the best art style and strategy, this game is the best on the App Store.

Still, its long and not worth a buy if you plan to update, definitely amazing. As close to beyond perfect as any GS on here.

Love this game! Perfect strategy game for iOS. Also fun with the real time battle stuff. If you like Civs on computer, this is a perfect, mobile, dumbed-down version. Can we get it updated tho??? I can’t play and I’m sad.

Probably the best strategy game I've played on the phone. Reminiscent of the total war games for PC but with its differences. Game hasn't crashed and I haven't run into any bugs. Super fun and I definitely recommend.

Will raise back to 5 stars when it is updated for new iOS

title.label: Great game- hope it is updated

content.label: This was a great game, very fun to play. Please update it for IOS 11 so we can continue to enjoy it

title.label: How long do we have to wait to get ios11 update?

content.label: I bought it and can’t play anymore because I upgraded my iPad. This game and warlords is awesome. Please updtae it to work with ios11

title.label: Fantastic game, one of my favorites for iOS!

content.label: It’s a bit reminiscent of Koei tecmo’s RotK. Definitely worth a buy if you’re pre iOS 11
Really decent game. Gets grindy towards the end but it’s decent. Meh diplomacy and combat wasn’t even that great but for an mobile game it was impressive
Update to work with current IOS version

content.label: Pretty awesome game, especially its free
I love this game so much, but now I can’t play it on IOS 11 please update!!!!!!

title.label: Great game but you can’t play it on iOS 11

content.label: I urge the creators to make an update for this as I payed good money for it and would be willing to spend more to continue playing it on iOS 11. Please update

Can't believe that this works like this on my phone !! Awesome game !!

Just wish I could play it online or with other people !

Honestly one of the best strategy games to play in the app store. Maybe add navy functions etc... but it really doesn't need it its an amazing game. Sadly tho, we can not play anymore since stupid ios 11. When I updated my Ipad, idk I would be loosing the best game on the market. I don’t know if the developers will see this, this may all be in vein. But I am begging you, please update so I may play again.
I really loved this game it had lots of fun strategy and I loved the game play, please try to find a way to update this it is one of my favorite games!!!!!
They’re refusing to update the game to be compatible with iOS 11 so now I can’t play it... this is completely ridiculous
I spent money hoping to be able to play one of the top strategy games i have ever found and now they tell me I can’t play it?!? Its total bull.
Easily one of my favorite games of all time on any platform. Why can't it be updated to continue play with the next IOS release? Please update!
Can you update this amazing game to iOS 11 please

This is a really good game, with the graphics and very strategical gameplay, but I haven’t been able to play it after IOS 11. My request is that you make this game available on IOS 11. This game really deserves a 5 star, but the fact that this game is being discontinued is outrageous!!!

title.label: It CAN be updated they choose not to update.

content.label: Almost every other paid app I own has been updated to 64bit and yet this dev claims it can't be done with their two apps.  I own both and paid for both at full price.  I never got around to playing this one and am half way through the other game Autumn.  Still haven't updated to ISO 11 as I want to finish up Autumn however there is no way I will get around to finishing this game as it's big and replay is great.  Wish devs would stop being lazy and support their games.
I would not have updated to IOS 11 if I had realized it would kill off this game for me. I love it to death, and I’m really hoping to see it updated to 64 bit so I can play it again.
why is it not working in ios 11.0.3？
I miss playing this great game ever since I’ve updated. Would be nice if it was made compatible, or even a whole new game was made.

From the beautiful artwork to the engaging gameplay, this stands out.

Well DONE, my friends.
I love this game so much, but why can’t you guys update it?! I wanna play the AD games so bad but after iOS11 I can’t!!
Please update this games for iOS 11. Thanks

title.label: best RTS on iphone so far

content.label: I'm a really big fan of the RTS genre and a bigger fan of how to do it on a mobile interface. This is hands down the best rts user experience on an iphone i've played to date.
Finally a fun strategy game on the iPad

Worth every penny. Had officer development, city development, troop development. Espionage is ver useful, which is nice since in most games it is useless. Strategy and diplomacy are necessary, quest are very useful and there are a vast choice. Best strategy game on iOS I've found so far

Just downloaded the game a couple hours ago but I am very impressed so far. It reminds me, like many have said, of Total War, a PC game series. It says a lot for an iOS game to be compared to that. I enjoy the battle aspect of the game, but I like even more the campaign side of things, where you're managing your empire, spying on enemies, and building your cities. It's a great experience and I know I'll put many hours into this one. Thanks developers!
I loved the game but there was a bug. Game we ant off before I saved it . I still played because game was adjective.

First off, top marks for theme & art.  But this feels like a game that was never play tested.  Lots and lots of problems.  Many mentioned in other review.  Your troops. An get placed in the middle of a mountain, immobilized, or in the center of the enemy camp for instant destruction.  Could be great with some polish, but not there yet.
Really liked the combat units.  Resource management was interesting and challenging.  Great game!

title.label: Great game but first 1 was better

content.label: Great game but I wish it focused more on the RTS factor and the battles instead of managing the kingdom and growing
If you like strategy games, you will like this one.
GREAT
Great game, I would highly recommend!
It's good
A very fun LONG game
Excellent strategy game, like Risk on steroids with governance policies and offensive tactics.
I hesitated due to the price tag, but after one play through I'm sold! Awesome balance and good story line. Better or more in depth tutorial, maybe outside the game would be awesome. Buy it!!!
The game is great! The only issue I have is I want more maps to play on!
